entitlements.instructions_project: Entitlements give users and/or reading groups access to this project. In Manifold, all projects are open by default. Enable access restrictions below to limit access to your project.
entitlements.instructions_journal: Journal entitlements give users and/or reading groups access to all of this journal's issues. You can also configure access to individual issues by granting entitlements on an issue's project.

new.user_select_placeholder: Select a User or Reading Group
new.expiration_instructions: Enter YYYY/MM/DD or a human-readable string, e.g. 'in one year'

pending.delete_confirm_heading: Are you sure you want to delete this entitlement?

form.add_instructions: Create an entitlement for a user who has not yet created an account on this Manifold instance. When the user registers, this entitlement will be automatically added to their account.
form.email_instructions: Email address is used to match newly created accounts to pending entitlements.
form.type_instructions: Is this entitlement for a project or a journal?
form.id_instructions: The ID of the project or journal that this is an entitlement to. This ID can be found in the project's url.
form.expiration_instructions: Optionally, set the expiration date for this entitlement.

form.upload_instructions: Manifold can import entitlements from a CSV file, including pending entitlements for not yet registered users. See the documentation for CSV format.
